page.title: 09Communications-Witton
page.content: {Postal services}The whole area contains 5 letter boxes.Some parts of the area have 2 collections & 2 deliveries a day,other parts 1 delivery & collection. {Telephone services}There are 3 telephone boxes & an automatic telphone exchange situated in the N.E. of the area.We can now make telephone calls to all parts of the world.The phone lines are vunerable to winter storms but are well maintained. {Emergency Services}There is an emergency siren in the event of nuclear war at Church Farm,Ridlington & a flood warning siren at Walcott Gap. N.Westerly gales coinciding with natural high tides bring the sea over the sea wall & the coast road & some properties may well be flooded.
